General.Name: Roda Vivatex Tbk
General.Description: PT Roda Vivatex Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the rental of office spaces in Indonesia. It is also involved in building management business. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Standard Chartered Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
